mapper.select: SELECT * FROM coupon WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{srchtext},'%')
SELECT * FROM users WHERE UserTypeId=200 and name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{srchtext},'%')
SELECT * FROM users WHERE UserTypeId=300 and name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{srchtext},'%')
SELECT * FROM product WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{srchtext},'%')
SELECT count(*) FROM USERS WHERE ID=300

select DATE_FORMAT(sc.REGDATE, '%b. %Y') AS sdate, sum(case when usertype=100 then sales end) as userType100, sum(case when usertype=200 then sales end) as userType200, sum(sales) as sales from( select SUM(O.PRICE) AS sales, O.REGDATE, U.USERTYPEID AS USERTYPE FROM ORDERS O inner JOIN USERS U ON O.USERSID = U.ID WHERE O.REGDATE BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -6 MONTH) AND NOW() group by O.REGDATE, USERTYPE ) sc group by sdate order by sc.REGDATE

select DATE_FORMAT(pc.REGDATE, '%b. %Y') AS sdate, sum(case when payInfo='카드' then sp end) as picard, sum(case when payInfo='현금' then sp end) as picash, sum(case when payInfo='간편결제' then sp end) as pipay from ( SELECT sum(price) as sp, REGDATE, payInfo from ORDERS WHERE REGDATE BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -6 MONTH) AND NOW() group by REGDATE, payInfo ) pc group by sdate order by REGDATE asc

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(REGDATE, '%b. %Y') AS sdate, sum(price) as sales, count(*) as ordercnt from ORDERS WHERE REGDATE BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -6 MONTH) AND NOW() group by DATE_FORMAT(REGDATE, '%b. %Y') order by REGDATE asc

select sum(o.odPrice) as sales, pr.catename as catename from ordersdetail o inner join ( select p.id as prid, p.name as name, p.price as price, p.cateid as cateid, c.name as catename, c.pid as cpid from product p inner join category c on p.cateid = c.id where p.cateid in (110, 120, 130, 210, 220, 230, 240) ) pr on o.prodId = pr.prid group by pr.catename
